location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Letter from John Croft Hawkins, Commodore commanding the Squadron in the Gulf of Persia, on board the Sloop Cliveoff Asseloo, to the Resident in the Gulf of Persia'

mods.abstract: Letter from John Croft Hawkins, Commodore commanding the Squadron in the Gulf of Persia, on board the Sloop Cliveoff Asseloo, reporting to Major Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, on the work done to comply with the instructions received by the Resident between October and November 1846, for the Squadron to counter piracy.In enclosure:Copy of the letter to the Sheikh of Asseloo requesting for payments for cargo plundered from British ships, 14 November 1846;Copy of the letter sent to Sheikh Ahmed bin Khulfan, demanding the restitution of the property plundered, 11 November 1846;Receipt of payments made by the Sheikh of Asseloo for cargo plundered from British ships, 14 November 1846.
